titlestmt.titleproper: Report of the Charles L. Bernheimer Expeditions, 1922-1930

did.head: Collection Summary
did.unittitle: Report of the Charles L. Bernheimer Expeditions, 1922-1930
did.abstract: Photocopy of report of expeditions sponsored by the American Museum of Natural History. Also consists of daily journal describing camps, travel conditions, and scenery during annual summer expeditions in Arizona and Utah between 1922 and 1930.

repository.label: Repository:
repository.corpname: University of Arizona Libraries, Special Collections

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: There are no restrictions on this collection.

prefercite.head: Credit Line
prefercite.p: Report of the Charles L. Bernheimer Expeditions (AZ 262). Special Collections, University of Arizona Libraries.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Photocopy of report of expeditions sponsored by the American Museum of Natural History. Consists of daily journal describing camps, travel conditions, and scenery during annual summer expeditions in Arizona and Utah between 1922 and 1930.

relatedmaterial.p: Original located at Museum of Northern Arizona, Flagstaff, Ariz.
